summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackEssence Stay & Play Gel Eyeliner has a highly-pigmented gel formula that delivers intense color and lasts up to 16 hours, without smudging or fading!
details: DetailsFeaturesHighly-pigmented gel eyeliner formulaGel eyeliner delivers intense color payoffCruelty freeFormulated WithoutAnimal byproductSiliconesItem 2611261How To UseUsing essence Stay & Play Gel Eyeliner, glide along your upper and lower lash lines, building fine or full color for long-lasting, gorgeous eye looks. Sharpen as needed with essence Duo Sharpener. To remove, use essence Remove Like A Boss Waterproof Eye Make-Up Remover.IngredientsBlack Raven: Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Synthetic Wax, Dimethicone, Polybutene, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide).
how_to_use: Using essence Stay & Play Gel Eyeliner, glide along your upper and lower lash lines, building fine or full color for long-lasting, gorgeous eye looks. Sharpen as needed with essence Duo Sharpener. To remove, use essence Remove Like A Boss Waterproof Eye Make-Up Remover.

reviews.headline: Colors are very vibrant w/ a touch of glitter
reviews.comments: Love these pencils.  I cannot find the metallic look in the market.  They're mainly as eyeshadow where u apply with brush.  I found these at the store.  A nice selection of colors.  They make your eyes pop.  Definitely would replen when I run out.  There's a few other colors I want to try!

reviews.headline: Love this liner!
reviews.comments: These liners glide on with no tugging and stay put! The color is rich and really enhance my eyes. They don't seem to dry out as some liners do as they get older. Price is excellent and these are as good oe better than many of the much more expensive liners!

reviews.headline: a pass for me
reviews.comments: For the price, this is a great find. I picked up the shade Silky Nude and love using it on my waterline, it really makes my eyes pop. The formula is nice and creamy, but unfortunately, it doesn't stay put. After just a few hours, it fades away, which is disappointing since that was the main reason I bought it.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Would definitely buy again

reviews.headline: Its okay
reviews.comments: I got emerald dragon. The pigment is great and gorgeous, applies to waterline nice and smooth. It didn't stay on waterline long, its not retractable ( very small amount of product). For the price its a give and take.

reviews.headline: Very good Gel eyeliner
reviews.comments: I was very surprised at how good this gel eyeliner was. I would compare it easily to the higher end brand of gel eyeliners. It goes on very smooth (great for mature eyes) and it stays on the eyelid very well.

reviews.headline: Enjoying
reviews.comments: So far loveing it, no smudging and very flattering on brown eyes

reviews.headline: Loved the color
reviews.comments: The color was exactly what I was looking for but it was impossible to sharpen the pencil to a point after each use.

reviews.headline: surprised
reviews.comments: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this eyeliner. I've been super into colored eyeliners here recently and just bought 8 different ones from Ulta and swatched them all on the back of my hand and the stardust color is staying just as well as the nyx epic wear colors I got.

reviews.headline: LOVE IT BUT
reviews.comments: Love these pencils but the sharpening is terrible.  I end up only able to use it til the tip wears down, and once i start sharpening it the entire pencil is good for nothing.

reviews.headline: A real Eye- Opener !
reviews.comments:
This product makes my eyes bright.
  I Love it.
 I will purchase this wonderful product again  ❤️ xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo
XOXOXOXOXO

reviews.headline: I will definitely purhase again
reviews.comments: This pencil works as well, if not better, than some of the higher priced pencils.  I will definitely keep purchasing from this brand.

reviews.headline: I will definitely purhase again
reviews.comments: Tihs pencil is very inexpensive and works just as well as some of the high end pencils that I have used.

reviews.headline: Good
reviews.comments: I got the regular black eyeliner, and it is really good for tightlining. It goes on very creamy and sets well, but sometimes I do have issues with it smudging or getting on my undereye if it does not set correctly. But still a really great eyeliner for the price!

reviews.headline: Eyeliner
reviews.comments: It's the best creamy eyeliner!!

reviews.headline: Great eyeliner
reviews.comments: Love the blue

reviews.headline: Great product, awful component
reviews.comments: This eyeliner goes on so creamy, and is easy to blend out on the lash line, but will also stay put in the waterline. I have it in the brown shade and really love it. The only problem is that the pencil itself is made of this weird plasticy material that is VERY hard to sharpen. I love a sharpenable pencil, much more than a retractible one for sanitary reasons. But I will problably not repurchase this because of what a hard time I have sharpening it.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again.
reviews.comments: Great product and great price!

reviews.headline: Great liner
reviews.comments: Goes on smoothly & the color is just perfectly

reviews.headline: Super smooth and silky
reviews.comments: Smudges a little but I think it is a great pencil that is safe and easy to use

media.headline: I would NOT buy this again (gel eyeliner - nude color)
media.caption: After trying to sharpen

media.headline: I would NOT buy this again (gel eyeliner - nude color)
media.caption: Unusable

faceoff_positive.comments: Ive been purchasing this nude eyeliner pencil for atleast the past 7 years or so, it works so well to brighten up my eyes when applied to the waterline and it has a decent staying power, its creamy and glides with ease. Value and budget friendly, this competes with some of the prestige brands. It's often difficult to find a nude eyeliner that will work in your waterline without breaking the bank but this never disappoints. Only cons, sometimes the pencil dries out and your tip will break off and you have to sharpen the pencil. The pros outweigh the cons, i wish Essence would make more colors in this gel eyeliner formula !
faceoff_positive.headline: Brighten your waterline with nude! HG

faceoff_negative.comments: I loved this so much when I got it. I was so impressed by the pigmentation and creaminess and longwear of it. It was better than my high end. it worked so well in the waterline BUT THEN I started noticing my eyes burned constantly and I always had stuff in my contacts, little black dots. hard black dots. and they gathered on my contact and in the corners of my eyes, constantly felt like dirt in my eyes. it also felt tight on my waterline after a couple hours. I thought at first it was the new mascaras I was trying and so I kept rinsing my contacts and I ruined soooooooo many incredible eyeshadow looks by the tearing and messing with them so much. I started eliminating products and I realized it's this. I discovered at first it's incredible but then a few hours in it begins getting soooo dry and crunchy that it crumbles into your eyes in little bits. its irritating. soooo amazing at first it truly bums me out. I bought the brown one too and I'm going to try to use these up as regular upper liner but no no no do not put in your water or tight line! especially not with contacts ugh
faceoff_negative.headline: I immediately loved then hated
